original: 潁川人，當代名士，司馬懿曾為其門下生；亦是名書法家，書法造詣與鍾繇齊名。袁紹、曹操都曾數度延攬胡昭，但胡昭不願出仕，隱居於陸渾山中，闔門守靜，不營當世。
text: A native of Yingchuan, a contemporary celebrity, Sima Yi was once a student of his school; he is also a calligrapher, and his calligraphy skills are as famous as Zhong Yao. Both Yuan Shao and Cao Cao had recruited Hu Zhao on several occasions, but Hu Zhao was reluctant to be an official.
